venue.address_1: Myrtle st (between Irving and South Russell St.)
venue.name: Myrtle Street Playground

item.description: I want to connect with other parents living in Downtown Boston and Cambridge with young Russian-speaking kids in order to set up a weekend play group. Possible activities could include: local playgrounds, aquarium and children's museum, going skating on Frog pond (or Kendall Square).

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Playgroup in Beacon Hill/Back Bay for kids under 6
